data.application.yml:
builtin:
  keystorePath: "/keystore/keystore.jks"
  keystorePrivateKeyAlias: "${KEYSTORE_ALIAS:tomcat}"
  keystorePass: "${KEYSTORE_JKS_PASSWORD:springboot}"
  jwtValidateSignature: "${VALIDATE_JWT:false}"
  jwtCertAlias: "portal-sso"
  hostNameVerificationEnabled: "false"

  defaultLockAtMostFor: "PT30S"
  opconbatch:
    start-delay-ms: 500
    expired:
      cron: "0 */15 * * * *"
      lockAtLeastFor: "PT30S"
      lockAtMostFor: "PT240S"
  rinnovimassivibatch:
    scheduledtask:
      cron: "-"
      lockAtLeastFor: "PT5S"
      lockAtMostFor: "PT61H"
  localielasticbatch:
    scheduledtask:
      cron: "-"
      lockAtLeastFor: "PT5S"
      lockAtMostFor: "PT600S"
  retryconvalidaemailbatch:
    scheduledtask:
      cron: "-"
      lockAtLeastFor: "PT5S"
      lockAtMostFor: "PT600S"
  messainmoramassivabatch:
    scheduledtask:
      cron: "-"
      lockAtLeastFor: "PT5S"
      lockAtMostFor: "PT240S"
  allineatabelledebatch:
    scheduledtask:
      cron: "-"
      lockAtLeastFor: "PT5S"
      lockAtMostFor: "PT3H"	  

  maxThreadsRinnoviMassivi: "2"
  generiLocaleRinnoviMassivi: 68,54,55,CE,50,41,05,44,48,59,65,AF,16,12,95,17,84,23,93,18,04,SR,11,MA,42,64,10,13,80,47
  timeZone: "Europe/Rome"
  startTimeStr: "18:00"
  endTimeStr: "06:00"
  weWindowActive: "true"

  maxThreadsLocali2Elastic: "1"
  limitLocali2Elastic: "100"

  maxThreadsRetryConvalidaEmail: "1"
  limitRetryConvalidaEmail: "100"
  
  maxThreadsMessaInMoraMassivi: "2"  
  moraStartTimeStr: "18:00"
  moraEndTimeStr: "06:00"  

integration:
  locali:
    baseUrl: "http://${LOCALE_SERVICE_SERVICE_HOST}:${LOCALE_SERVICE_SERVICE_PORT}/api"
    send2Elastic: "/locali/send2Elastic/{id}"
  abbonamento:
    baseUrl: "http://${GESTIONE_ABBONAMENTO_SERVICE_SERVICE_HOST}:${GESTIONE_ABBONAMENTO_SERVICE_SERVICE_PORT}/api/mda"
    eseguirinnovo: "/rinnovo/eseguiRinnovoScheda/{id}/{idSchedaRinnovo}"
    eseguirinnovodc: "/rinnovo/eseguiRinnovoSchedaDC/{id}/{flagAnnulla}/{idSchedaRinnovo}"
  accertamenti-autorali:
    baseUrl: "http://${ACCERTAMENTI_AUTORALI_SERVICE_SERVICE_HOST}:${ACCERTAMENTI_AUTORALI_SERVICE_SERVICE_PORT}/api/aa"
    retryConvalidaEmail: "/costatazione/retryConvalidaEmail"
  avvisoMora:
    baseUrl: "http://${GESTIONE_ABBONAMENTO_SERVICE_SERVICE_HOST}:${GESTIONE_ABBONAMENTO_SERVICE_SERVICE_PORT}/api"
    invio: "/mda/invioAvvisoMora"
    invioDc: "/dc/invioAvvisoMora"

management:
  tracing:
    enabled: false
    sampling:
      propability: 1.0

---
resilience4j:
  circuitbreaker:
    configs:
        default:
            registerHealthIndicator: false
            permittedNumberOfCallsInHalfOpenState: 30
            slidingWindowSize: 50
            minimumNumberOfCalls: 50
            waitDurationInOpenState: 10s
            failureRateThreshold: 80
            slowCallRateThreshold: 90
            slowCallDurationThreshold: 30s
            eventConsumerBufferSize: 1
            ignoreExceptions: []
                
        shared:
            registerHealthIndicator: false
            permittedNumberOfCallsInHalfOpenState: 30
            slidingWindowSize: 50
            minimumNumberOfCalls: 50
            waitDurationInOpenState: 10s
            failureRateThreshold: 80
            slowCallRateThreshold: 90
            slowCallDurationThreshold: 30s
            eventConsumerBufferSize: 1
            ignoreExceptions: []
               
    backends:
      backendTemplate:
        registerHealthIndicator: false
        baseConfig: default
     
springdoc:
  api-docs:
    enabled: true
  swagger-ui:
    enabled: true
  pathsToMatch: /api/**
  path: /v3/api-docs

spring:
  datasource:
    username: "${SPORT_DATASOURCE_USERNAME}"
    password: "${SPORT_DATASOURCE_PASSWORD}"
    url: "${SPORT_DATASOURCE_JDBC_URL}"
	driver-class-name: oracle.jdbc.driver.OracleDriver
    hikari:
      connection-timeout: 60000
      idle-timeout: 60000
      maximum-pool-size: 25
      minimum-idle: 5
      max-lifetime: 900000
      pool-name: sport-pool
  dataentry-datasource:
   username: "${DATAENTRY_DATASOURCE_USR}"
   password: "${DATAENTRY_DATASOURCE_PSW}"
   url: "${DATAENTRY_DATASOURCE_JDBC_URL}"
   driver-class-name: oracle.jdbc.driver.OracleDriver
   hikari:
     connection-timeout: 60000
     idle-timeout: 60000
     maximum-pool-size: 25
     minimum-idle: 5
     max-lifetime: 900000
     pool-name: secondary-pool
  jpa:
    #database-platform: org.hibernate.dialect.Oracle10gDialect
    show_sql: false
    hibernate:
      ddl-auto: none
      use_sql_comments: true
      format_sql: true
    properties:
      hibernate:
         dialect: org.hibernate.dialect.OracleDialect
oracle:
  jdbc:
    fanEnabled: false


---
spring:
  config:
    activate:
      on-profile: dev,default
  datasource:
    username: "${SPORT_DATASOURCE_USERNAME:spei_user_ws}"
    password: "${SPORT_DATASOURCE_PASSWORD:dfb2_ba51}"
    url: "${SPORT_DATASOURCE_JDBC_URL:jdbc:oracle:thin:@//dboratst-sport-scan.net.siae:1521/SPORTEST.NET.SIAE}"
  dataentry-datasource:
    username: "${DATAENTRY_DATASOURCE_USR:be_admin}"
    password: "${DATAENTRY_DATASOURCE_PSW:be_admin}"
    url: "${DATAENTRY_DATASOURCE_JDBC_URL:jdbc:oracle:thin:@dbora.sviluppo.siae:1521/BASVIL.NET.SIAE}"
  cloud:
    openfeign:
      client:
        config:
         default:
          connectTimeout: "2000"
          readTimeout: "20000"
          loggerLevel: "FULL"
      httpclient:
        maxConnections: 200
        maxConnectionsPerRoute: 200

configuration:
  name: "${name:opcon-batch}"
logging:
  level:
    root: "${ROOT_LOG_LEVEL:INFO}"
    it.siae.opcon.batch: "${SERVICE_LOG_LEVEL:DEBUG}"
    feign: "${FEIGN_LOG_LEVEL:DEBUG}"
  pattern:
    console: "%d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS} %highlight(%-5level) [${spring.application.name}] [trace=%16X{X-B3-TraceId:-},span=%16X{X-B3-SpanId:-}] %-30logger{0}: %m%n"
  rest:
    controller:
      "it.siae.opcon.batch.controllers.MdaRinnoviMassiviController"
  config: "logback/logback.xml"
logback.access:
  enabled: true
  config: "logback/logback-access.xml"
server:
  port: 8080

integration:
  locali:
    baseUrl: "http://${LOCALE_SERVICE_SERVICE_HOST:locale-service-sport-coll.apps.ocp-noprod.openshift.siae}:${LOCALE_SERVICE_SERVICE_PORT:80}/api"
    send2Elastic: "/locali/send2Elastic/{id}"
  abbonamento:
    baseUrl: "http://${GESTIONE_ABBONAMENTO_SERVICE_SERVICE_HOST:gestione-abbonamento-service-sport-coll.apps.ocp-noprod.openshift.siae}:${GESTIONE_ABBONAMENTO_SERVICE_SERVICE_PORT:80}/api/mda"
    eseguirinnovo: "/rinnovo/eseguiRinnovoScheda/{id}/{idSchedaRinnovo}"
  accertamenti-autorali:
    baseUrl: "http://${ACCERTAMENTI_AUTORALI_SERVICE_SERVICE_HOST:accertamenti-autorali-service-sport-coll.apps.ocp-noprod.openshift.siae}:${ACCERTAMENTI_AUTORALI_SERVICE_SERVICE_PORT:80}/api/aa"
    retryConvalidaEmail: "/costatazione/retryConvalidaEmail"
  avvisoMora:
    baseUrl: "http://${GESTIONE_ABBONAMENTO_SERVICE_SERVICE_HOST:gestione-abbonamento-service-sport-coll.apps.ocp-noprod.openshift.siae}:${GESTIONE_ABBONAMENTO_SERVICE_SERVICE_PORT:80}/api/mda"
    invio: "/invioAvvisoMora"
    invioDc: "/invioAvvisoMoraDc"

builtin:
  maxThreadsLocali2Elastic: "1"
  maxThreadsRinnoviMassivi: "1"  
  maxThreadsRetryConvalidaEmail: "1"
---
spring:
  config:
    activate:
      on-profile: systest
  datasource:
    username: "${SPORT_DATASOURCE_USERNAME:spei_user_ws}"
    password: "${SPORT_DATASOURCE_PASSWORD:spei_user_ws}"
    url: "${SPORT_DATASOURCE_JDBC_URL:jdbc:oracle:thin:@//dbora.sviluppo.siae:1521/SPORTSVI.NET.SIAE}"
  dataentry-datasource:
    username: "${DATAENTRY_DATASOURCE_USR:be_admin}"
    password: "${DATAENTRY_DATASOURCE_PSW:be_admin}"
    url: "${DATAENTRY_DATASOURCE_JDBC_URL:jdbc:oracle:thin:@dbora.sviluppo.siae:1521/BASVIL.NET.SIAE}"
  cloud:
    openfeign:
      client:
        config:
         default:
          connectTimeout: "2000"
          readTimeout: "20000"
          loggerLevel: "FULL"
      httpclient:
        maxConnections: 200
        maxConnectionsPerRoute: 200

configuration:
  name: "${name:opcon-batch}"
logging:
  level:
    root: "${ROOT_LOG_LEVEL:INFO}"
    it.siae.opcon.batch: "${SERVICE_LOG_LEVEL:DEBUG}"
    feign: "${FEIGN_LOG_LEVEL:DEBUG}"
  pattern:
    console: "%d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS} %highlight(%-5level) [${spring.application.name}] [trace=%16X{X-B3-TraceId:-},span=%16X{X-B3-SpanId:-}] %-30logger{0}: %m%n"
  rest:
    controller:
       "it.siae.opcon.batch.controllers.MdaRinnoviMassiviController"
  config: "logback/logback.xml"
logback.access:
  enabled: true
  config: "logback/logback-access.xml"
server:
  port: 8080
  tomcat:
    accept-count: "0"
    max-connections: "200"
    max-threads: "200"
    min-spare-threads: "50"
  ssl:
    enabled: false
    key-alias: tomcat
    key-password: "${IDENTITY_KEY_PASSWORD:springboot}"
    key-store: file:///keystore/Identity.jks
    key-store-provider: SUN
    key-store-type: JKS
    key-store-password: "${IDENTITY_JKS_PASSWORD:springboot}"

integration:
  legacy:
    baseUrl: "http://${LEGACY_SERVICE_SERVICE_HOST:legacy-service-sport-dev.apps.ocp-noprod.openshift.siae}:${LEGACY_SERVICE_SERVICE_PORT:80}/api/utilities"
    sepraglistbysedi: "/ndm/getSepragBySedi"
    sepraglistbyndm: "/info/ndm/getAllSeprag"

    puntiterritorialilist: "/info/ndm/puntiterritoriali/list"
    findCircoscrizione: "/info/ndm/puntiterritoriali/findCircoscrizione"

    retryConvalidaEmail: "/costatazione/retryConvalidaEmail"
  avvisoMora:

    invio: "/invioAvvisoMora"
    invioDc: "/invioAvvisoMoraDc"
builtin:
  maxThreadsLocali2Elastic: "1"
  maxThreadsRinnoviMassivi: "1"
  maxThreadsRetryConvalidaEmail: "1"
